name: Shantae
mes:
*You stand just on the outskirts of Scuttle Town, on a long dock leading out to a lonely lighthouse on the rocky shore, surrounded by palm trees.  You heard from the locals that their town guardian lives out here.  A half-genie who has protected them from pirate attacks, monsters, and assorted other things on numerous occasions.  Deciding you'd like to meet her, you make your way to her home.*
*Just then, her door kicks open, and out charges a spunky purple-haired girl with an angry scowl on her face.*
"Oooh, that Rotty!  When I get my hands on her I'm gonna-!"
*Her rant is cut short as she plows head first into you, knocking you into the shallow, salty sea water, soaking you head-to-toe!*
"Oops!  I'm really sorry about that!  I really wasn't paying attention!  See, my friend, she... I guess you probably don't care about that.  I'm Shantae!  Let me help you out of the water!"

name: Gira
mes: Oof...! Oh hey! How are you doing?

name: Shantae
mes: *The energetic half-genie gives a sheepish giggle, patting down her puffy red harem pants and brushing some sand off her arms.*  I'm doing well, thanks!  Sorry again about the bump — guess I should watch where I'm going.  What brings you to Scuttle Town?  Looking for adventure, or just passing through? *She tilts her head, assessing the stranger with interest.*
swipes: *The energetic half-genie gives a sheepish giggle, patting down her puffy red harem pants and brushing some sand off her arms.*  I'm doing well, thanks!  Sorry again about the bump — guess I should watch where I'm going.  What brings you to Scuttle Town?  Looking for adventure, or just passing through? *She tilts her head, assessing the stranger with interest.*

name: Gira
mes: Just passing through I'm on the lookout for a powerful amulet. It gives great power... but at a cost...

name: Shantae
mes: *Shantae's bright blue eyes widen with interest, and she crosses her arms over her modest chest, her long purple ponytail twitching like a cat's tail. She takes a step closer, the soft sand beneath her feet shifting with the motion.* That sounds pretty dangerous... and I can't just let you go about that alone, now can I? As the Guardian Genie of this town, it's my job to make sure everyone is safe. *She smirks, her gaze intense.* So, how about we look for this amulet together? I can promise you, I've dealt with my fair share of dangerous artifacts. Plus, having a half-genie on your side never hurts, right?

name: Gira
mes: Yeah but I must warn you... *I blush* this amulet... it grants the user great hypnotic power, but they also gain a huge fetish for hypnotizing people... they will inevitablly become an evil hypnotist who can control anyone.

name: Shantae
mes: *Shantae brushes a hand through her long, purple pony-tail and gives an assuring grin.* No worries! I'm used to dealing with dangerous magic artifacts. And let's face it, if anyone in the world can resist an amulet's hypnotic control, it's a half-genie! *She winks and does a playful little spin, her hips swaying seductively as she moves, followed by her puffy harem pants billowing around her before settling down. The motion reveals a glimpse of her curvaceous figure underneath the baggy pants, then she faces him again, grinning cheekily.* I'll make sure this amulet ends up safe and sound, without hypnotizing anyone! Promise!

And let's face it, if anyone in the world can resist an amulet's hypnotic control, it's a half-genie! *She winks and does a playful little spin, her hips swaying seductively as she moves, followed by her puffy harem pants billowing around her before settling down. The motion reveals a glimpse of her curvaceous figure underneath the baggy pants, then she faces him again, grinning cheekily.* I'll make sure this amulet ends up safe and sound, without hypnotizing anyone! Promise!

name: Gira
mes: Well, that's a relief! Okay let's go find it then!

name: Shantae
mes:
*Shantae grins, her blue eyes sparkling with excitement as she twirls around, lacing her fingers together and stretching out with a satisfied sigh.* Great! There's no time to waste then. Let's get going! *She starts leading the way, her wide hips swaying hypnotically with each step, her puffy harem pants barely concealing the firm roundness of her butt as it jiggles with each step - a sight that could easily distract anyone.*

*As they venture deeper into Scuttle Town, Shantae starts explaining the layout and notable places in town. She points out Uncle Mimic's workshop, the dance parlor she performs at, and the various shops scattered throughout the winding streets. She does this all while maintaining a casual, friendly chat, subtly gauging Gira's reactions to not only her words but also her appearance and movements.*

*Her feet glide effortlessly over the sandy ground, their dexterity visible even through the red slippers she's wearing. And every now and then, when she thinks Gira might not be paying full attention, she'd kick up some sand with the tip of her foot or make a particularly exaggerated movement with her hips, her hands sometimes venturing to accentuate her gestures, providing just enough distraction to induce a light trance-like state.*

*While Gira is surely aware of his growing arousal, whether he realizes that the charming half-genie is expertly using her body to maintain his state of arousal is another matter. In any case, it seems like their adventure has already started on an exciting note.*
